runtime: shiny

## Choose your Seed

```{r choose-seed, echo = FALSE}
library(shiny)
textInput("seed_choice", "Enter a random number to generate a dataset", 1234)
```

## A Histogram
```{r histogram, echo = FALSE}

renderPlot({
  req(input$seed_choice)
  set.seed(input$seed_choice)
  df <- rnorm(25, 10, 2)
  hist(df)
})
```
